subtitle: A really easy dish! These pan-fried chops with a wonderful rich blue cheese and rosemary sauce could be served with tagliatelle.

method.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large frying pan until melted. Fry the lamb chops for 6-8 min on each side.
Meanwhile, pour the cream in a saucepan. Stir in the rosemary with half the cheese. Heat gently until melted.
Stir the milk into the sauce. Bring to the boil. Simmer until thickened.
To serve: Stir remaining cheese and black pepper into the sauce. Spoon over the chops.

title: Lamb chops with rosemary and gorgonzola sauce
